omopColumns.name: nhs_number
omopColumns.query:
with co as (
    select
        Record ->> '$.Colorectal.ColorectalCore.ColorectalCoreLinkagePatientId.NHSNumber.@extension' as NhsNumber,
        Record ->> '$.Colorectal.ColorectalCore.ColorectalCoreLinkageDiagnosticDetails.ClinicalDateCancerDiagnosis' as ClinicalDateCancerDiagnosis,
        Record ->> '$.Colorectal.ColorectalCore.ColorectalCoreStaging.IntegratedStageTCategory' as TCategoryIntegratedStage,
        Record ->> '$.Colorectal.ColorectalCore.ColorectalCoreStaging.IntegratedStageTNMStageGroupingDate' as StageDateIntegratedStage
    from omop_staging.cosd_staging_81
    where Type = 'CO'
)
select distinct
    NhsNumber,
    coalesce(StageDateIntegratedStage, ClinicalDateCancerDiagnosis) as MeasurementDate,
    TCategoryIntegratedStage
from co
where TCategoryIntegratedStage is not null;

omopColumns.name: measurement_date

dataSource.name: MeasurementDate
dataSource.description: Measurement Date is the date on which TNM Stage Grouping (Integrated) was recorded, but if this is not available, then it is the date the Primary Cancer was confirmed or the Primary Cancer diagnosis was agreed.

origins.origin: DATE OF PRIMARY CANCER DIAGNOSIS (CLINICALLY AGREED)

omopColumns.name: measurement_type_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `32828`. EHR episode record

omopColumns.name: measurement_concept_id

dataSource.name: TCategoryIntegratedStage
dataSource.description: Is the code, using a TNM CODING EDITION, which classifies the size and extent of the primary Tumour after treatment and/or after all available evidence has been collected during a Cancer Care Spell.

    select
        Record ->> '$.Colorectal.ColorectalCore.ColorectalCoreLinkagePatientId.NHSNumber.@extension' as NhsNumber,

    coalesce(StageDateIntegratedStage, ClinicalDateCancerDiagnosis) as MeasurementDate,
    TCategoryIntegratedStage
